CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 6 - Right to a fair trial;Violation of Article 1 of Protocol No. 1 - Protection of property
JUDGES: Karel Jungwiert;Mark Villiger;Mykhaylo Buromenskiy;Peer Lorenzen;Rait Maruste;Renate Jaeger;Zdravka Kalaydjieva
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in the city of GPE , GPE .
CARDINAL . The applicant is a former military serviceman . In DATE he was transferred to the reserve .

CARDINAL . On an unspecified date the applicant instituted proceedings in ORG of Gorlovka ( “ the court ” ) against ORG ( “ the enlistment office ” ) claiming payment of a single - payment allowance due to him , compensation for non - pecuniary damage and CARDINAL NORP hryvnias ( ORG ) in compensation for the court fees .

CARDINAL . While the proceedings were still pending , the enlistment office paid the allowance . Therefore , the applicant withdrew his claims regarding payment of the allowance and compensation for non - pecuniary damage .
CARDINAL . On DATE the court awarded the applicant UAH CARDINAL in compensation for the court fees , to be paid by the enlistment office . The judgment was not appealed against and became final .
CARDINAL . On an unspecified date ORG ( “ ORG ” ) initiated enforcement proceedings in respect of that judgment .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG suspended enforcement proceedings since the court had not indicated the debtor 's account in the enforcement writ .

CARDINAL . Later the enlistment office was closed down . The latter 's debts were transferred to its successor , ORG . On DATE the court granted the applicant 's request and changed the debtor in the enforcement proceedings . The applicant re - lodged the enforcement writ with ORG .
CARDINAL . The relevant domestic law is summarised in the judgment of ORG v. GPE ( no . CARDINAL/CARDINAL , § § DATE , DATE ) .
